donatePageText:
Organise provides this app free of charge, because we believe everyone should have the tools, network and confidence to make change happen at work.

So, we offer a pay-what-you-can model to help support our work on this app. If you find Chronicle useful, then please consider sending us a one-time donation, or setting up a regular payment.

Thank you!

The Organise team
welcomeText: Keep a note of what happens to you at work as well as evidence of the incidents
